Key Match Events: Pete Alonso crushed a go-ahead home run in the 9th inning for the Mets
Post-Match Reflections: The four-time All-Star Alonso came up clutch when the Mets needed him the most
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets went from down 2-0 to up 3-2 after Alonso's home run
Others: The game was part of the NL Wild Card series, Game 3
